author: marcosc
msg: Fixed 57 fuzzy translations and 31 untranslated messages.

author: sussman
msg: ra_dav bugfix:  allow DELETE request on locked file.
When adding/deleting files, make sure PUT and DELETE requests specify
the specific URL in the If: header, next to the lock-token.  Otherwise
mod_dav tries to assert the token for both child *and* parent.
(commit_delete_entry, commit_close_file): send URL in If: header,

author: fitz
msg: New test to make sure that we can delete a directory containing locked
files.  This passes on svnserve and ra_local, but is known to fail
over ra_dav because ra_dav is currently crashing when it attempts to
create multiple locks in one request.

author: fitz
msg: New test to make sure that we can remotely delete a lock on a
previously deleted path.  This passes on svnserve and ra_local, but is
known to fail over ra_dav, but sussman's currently working on a fix
